name: uaip-backend
description: Unified Agent Intelligence Platform Backend Services

scripts.clean: pnpm exec tsc -b tsconfig.build.json --clean && pnpm exec tsc -b tsconfig.build_shared.json --clean
scripts.build-services: pnpm exec tsc -b tsconfig.build.json --clean && pnpm exec tsc -b tsconfig.build.json
scripts.build-shared: pnpm exec tsc -b tsconfig.build_shared.json --clean && pnpm exec tsc -b tsconfig.build_shared.json
scripts.dev: concurrently  "pnpm dev:agent" "pnpm dev:sec" "pnpm dev:cap" "pnpm dev:art-ser" "pnpm dev:orch-pipe" "pnpm dev:disc-orch"
scripts.dev:agent: export SERVICE_NAME=agent-intelligence && cd services/agent-intelligence && pnpm run dev
scripts.dev:sec: export SERVICE_NAME=security-gateway && cd services/security-gateway && pnpm run dev
scripts.dev:cap: export SERVICE_NAME=capability-registry && cd services/capability-registry && pnpm run dev
scripts.dev:art-ser: export SERVICE_NAME=artifact-service && cd services/artifact-service && pnpm run dev
scripts.dev:orch-pipe: export SERVICE_NAME=orchestration-pipeline && cd services/orchestration-pipeline && pnpm run dev
scripts.dev:disc-orch: export SERVICE_NAME=discussion-orchestration && cd services/discussion-orchestration && pnpm run dev
